description: Tasks template for upgrade plan to migrate Java project to latest LTS versions

tasks.requirements: Upgrade JDK to Java 21, update build configuration (pom.xml/build.gradle) to target Java 21, address any compatibility issues with language features and APIs
tasks.taskSummary: Successfully upgraded Java version from 17 to 21 in pom.xml. Build passes and unit tests pass.

tasks.description: Upgrade Spring Boot to version 3.4 and Spring Framework to 6.x
tasks.requirements: Upgrade Spring Boot to 3.4, Spring Framework to 6.x, migrate javax.* to jakarta.* namespace, update deprecated APIs, and resolve breaking changes
tasks.taskSummary: Successfully upgraded Spring Boot from 3.2.1 to 3.4.4 and Spring Framework to 6.2.x. No javax.* to jakarta.* migration needed as project already uses jakarta namespace. Build passes and unit tests pass.

tasks.description: Upgrade project dependencies to compatible versions
tasks.requirements: Update all third-party dependencies to versions compatible with Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4, resolve dependency conflicts, and ensure no deprecated dependencies remain
tasks.taskSummary: Successfully upgraded AWS SDK from 2.25.13 to 2.42.1 in both web and worker modules. All Spring Boot managed dependencies remain at their Spring Boot 3.4.4-compatible versions. Build passes and unit tests pass. Security compliance achieved by upgrading to latest stable dependency versions.
